titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, President, Colin G. Campbell papers, RG 2, Series 2
A Guide to the Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, President, Colin G. Campbell papers, RG 2, Series 2 FA1300

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-12 16:18:28 -0400.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, President, Colin G. Campbell papers, RG 2, Series 2

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than twenty years old are open for research. Brittle or damaged materials are available at the discretion of RAC.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Colin G. Campbell served as President of the Rockefeller Brothers Fund from 1988-2000.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Records primarily consists of Colin G. Campbell's files pertaining to the Rockefeller Brothers Fund Board of Trustees meetings and Committee meetings, including agendas, minutes and associated correspondence. Some meeting records have notes written by Campbell. This series also contains trip files from trips taken to Eastern and Central Europe as well as Asia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php
